data_description.debounce_cooldown:
If you experience unusual activities in player state cycling between 'Playing' and 'Idle', you can consider using this setting. 
Sets a delay (in seconds) before transitioning to the 'Idle' state when an irregular shift from 'Playing' is detected. 
Recommended value: 100 seconds; default is disabled (0).
